classmethod full_residuals_plot2(ml, path=None, fformat='png', show=False)[source]
static hcolormesh(mlevels, rows=None, cols=None, path=None, fformat='png', show=False, save=True, size=None)[source]

create a colormesh of the Hamiltonian matrix

Parameters

  • mlevels (object) – MoleculeLevels object

  • rows (tuple, optional) – the row indecies. Defaults to None.

  • cols (tuple, optional) – the col indices. Defaults to None.

  • path (str, optional) – path where to save the created figure.

  • to None. (Defaults) –

  • fformat (str, optional) – File extension. Defaults to ‘png’.

  • show (bool, optional) – whether to show the image.

  • to False. (Defaults) –

Remarks:

1. rows and cols should be tuples with two integer numbers - the first and the last row and the first and the last column of the submatrix whcih to be plotted 2. cannot be called as option from plot()

classmethod plot_residuals_hist(ml, path=None, fformat='png', save=True, show=False, xlabel=None, ylabel=None, bins=30, fname=None, with_sns=False, size=None)[source]
classmethod plot_residuals_level(mlevels, path=None, fformat='png', show=False, xlabel=None, ylabel=None, save=True, size=None)[source]
classmethod plot_residuals_level_subplots(mlevels, path=None, fformat='png', show=False, save=True, size=None, nrows=1, ncols=2, isotope=None)[source]
static plot_wavefunctions(wffile, props=None, path=None, subplots=True, fformat='png', title='', xlabel='R', ylabel='wavefunction', leg='')[source]

Plot the interpolated wavefunction over the interpolation grid

Parameters

  • wffile – file where the interpolated wavefunction is stored

  • props – various properties concerning the style of the figure

  • path – the directory path where the figure will be saved

  • fformat – the file format of the figure (e.g. png, eps,…)

  • title – the title of the figure

  • subplots – whether the wavefunctions to be plotted as subplots

Returns: None
